name: Cave Environment
description: Dark underground caverns with poor visibility and unstable terrain

1.name: Shallow Cave
1.description: A well-lit cave entrance with some visibility

effects.message: The dim lighting makes it harder to see clearly.

2.name: Cave Tunnel
2.description: Deeper into the cave with reduced lighting

effects.message: The deeper cave tunnel reduces visibility.

3.name: Dark Cave
3.description: Limited natural light, navigation becomes difficult

effects.message: The darkness makes precise movements challenging.
The deep cave's darkness hampers your vision.

5.name: Underground Chamber
5.description: Large cave chamber with falling rocks and uneven ground

effects.message: Loose rocks and uneven ground create hazards in the darkness.

6.name: Dangerous Cavern
6.description: Unstable cave system with frequent rockfalls

effects.message: The dangerous cavern threatens with falling rocks and poor footing.

7.name: Treacherous Depths
7.description: Deep cave system with significant hazards

effects.message: The treacherous cave depths endanger you with falling debris.
The abyssal cavern's complete darkness and unstable ceiling create extreme danger.
The nightmare depths assault you with total darkness and falling rocks.

10.name: Collapsing Abyss
10.description: Extremely unstable cave system on the verge of collapse

effects.message: The collapsing abyss threatens to bury you under tons of rock.

earth.description: Earth types are immune to cave hazards and see well in darkness

fire.description: Fire types struggle with the darkness and damp conditions

water.description: Water types are hindered by the dry, rocky environment

air.description: Air types struggle in the confined, still air of caves

lightning.description: Lightning types have difficulty in the grounded environment

protectionItems.name: Spelunker's Helmet
protectionItems.description: Complete protection from cave hazards with built-in lighting and head protection

protectionItems.name: Torch
protectionItems.description: Provides light to reduce visibility penalties but offers no physical protection

protectionItems.name: Climbing Boots
protectionItems.description: Reduces tripping hazards but doesn't help with falling rocks or visibility

encounterText.entry: You enter the cave system, where shadows dance and rocks threaten to fall...
encounterText.immunity: Your earth type nature allows you to navigate the cave with natural ease!
encounterText.protection: Your protective gear shields you from the cave's hazards.
encounterText.damage: The unstable cave environment tests your endurance!
encounterText.statusEffect: The treacherous terrain and falling rocks disorient you!

battleMessages.environmentActive: The cave's darkness and unstable terrain affect the battle!
battleMessages.immunityMessage: Earth types move through caves with natural confidence!
battleMessages.damageMessage: Falling rocks and poor footing create additional hazards!
battleMessages.accuracyPenalty: The cave's darkness makes accurate attacks difficult!
battleMessages.tripping: Uneven ground and loose rocks create tripping hazards!
